thread.title: Mega-prospect Zion Williamson did another crazy basketball thing
thread.title_full: Mega-prospect Zion Williamson did another crazy basketball thing

title: Mega-prospect Zion Williamson did another crazy basketball thing
text:
Mega-prospect Zion Williamson did another crazy basketball thing At this rate, he'll be a household name before he ever steps foot on a college campus. — Jim Ice (@Jim_ICE) February 14, 2017 
Zion Williamson is the No. 1 prospect in the class of 2018, but at the rate his generating insane highlights, he might be a household name before he ever steps foot on a college campus. His latest superhuman was a live-game windmill dunk in a 94-32 win for Spartanburg (S.C.) Day School over Shannon Forest Christian on Monday night. 
This is Williamson's second dunk-of-the-year nominee in the past fortnight alone, the previous one being one he threw down after launching from just inside the free-throw stripe. 
The 6'7, 220-pound forward is the No. 1 prospect in the 2018 class, according to 247Sports.
